description:
A tale never loses in the telling.故事越传越长。

AM things grow with time, except grief.除了悲伤，万事都会与日倶增。

All things has an end, a pudding has two.万物皆有其终点。

AM things have a beginning, God excepted. P余 了 上帝，万物皆有起源。

AM time is no time when it is past.光阴一去不复返。

An hour in the morning is worth two in the evening. —日之计在于晨。

An inch of time is an inch of gold but you can't buy that inch of time with an inch of gold. —寸光阴一寸金，寸金难买寸光阴。

Better early than late,宁早勿迟。

Do it now.机不可失。//今日事，今日毕。

Don't put off till tomorrow what should be done today.今日事，今日毕。

Early mi stakes are the seeds of future trouble,早期的错误可以酿成日后的麻烦。

Early sow, early mow.早早栽种，早早收割。

Early start makes easy stages.事早行，易顺遂。

Easy come, easy go.来得容易去得快。//来得快去得快。

Employ your time well if you meanest to get I e i sure.善用时间，方有闲日叚。

Every minute counts.分秒必争。

title: 关于时间的英语谚语：故事越传越长

description:
One cannot put back the clock

光阴一去不复返。

One hour today is worth two tomorrow.

今日的一小时抵得上明日的两小时。

One today is worth two tomorrows.

—个今天抵得上两个明天。

Procrast i nat i on is the thief of time.

拖延即浪费时间。

Take time for deliberation; haste spoils everything,

静下来慢慢想，欲速则不达。

The best time to worry is tomorrow.

最佳的忧虑时间就是明天。

The busiest men find / have the most leisure / time

最忙碌的人时间最多。

The early bird catches the worm.

早起的鸟儿有虫吃。

The early man never borrows from the I ate man.

早起三朝当一工，免得求人落下风。

The longer the night lasts, the more our dreams will be.

夜长梦多。

The morning is wiser than the evening,

早晨比夜晚有智慧。

title: 关于时间的英语谚语：拖延即浪费时间

description:
Lost time is never found again,

岁月既往，一去不回。

Lost wealth can be replaced by industry， lost know I edge by study, lost health by temperance or medicine, but lost time is gone for ever.

失去的财富， 靠勤劳赚回;失去的知识，靠学习复得;失去的健康，可通过节制或药物恢复;但失去的 时间，却一去永不复返。

Make the night night, and the day day, and you wiI I have a pleasant time of it,

白天做白天的事，夜晚做夜晚的事，生活好过快乐多。

More worship the rising than the setting sun,

人都向旭日膜拜，不向夕阳顶礼。

No man can call again yesterday.

光阴一去不复返。

No one can call back yesterday,

往日一去不复返。

No time (to waste) like the present.

当下的时间最宝贵。

None but a wise man can employ leisure weII.

唯智者善于利用空闲。(lei sure:空闲时间;闲暇)。

On the great clock of time there is but one word, “Now” .

在时间的大钟上只 有一个词：“现在”。

Once a cock begins to crow, it never again becomes dumb.

当公鸡一开汐台啼叫，就不会安静。
